summary: On trial for murdering his girlfriend, philandering stockbroker Larry Ballentine takes the stand to claim his innocence and describe the actual, but improbable sounding, sequence of events that led to her death.
cast: Susan Hayward|Robert Young|Jane Greer|Rita Johnson|Tom Powers|George Tyne|Don Beddoe|Frank Ferguson|Harry Harvey|Jean Andren|Polly Bailey|Brooks Benedict|Nina Borget|Lovyss Bradley|Chet Brandenburg|Lillian Bronson|Ivan Browning|Anthony Caruso|James Conaty|Ellen Corby|Anne Cornwall|Harry D'Arcy|Helen Dickson|Lida Durova|Dot Farley|Franklyn Farnum|Charles Flynn|Byron Foulger|Lee Frederick|Jack Gargan|William Gillespie|Sol Gorss|Wilton Graff|Fred Graham|Robert Haines|Herbert Heywood|Carl Kent|Glen Knight|Perc Launders|Bert LeBaron|Bertha Ledbetter|Paul Maxey|Matt McHugh|George Morrell|William J.
